references.formattedCitation: Talbert, Richard J. A., ed. Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World. Princeton, N.J.: Princeton University Press, 2000. http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/43970336.

description: A river of Messenia mentioned in ancient sources. The Balyra corresponds to the modern Mavrozoumena in Greece, in particular to a section stretching from modern Neokhori to a confluence with the Pamisos.

history.comment: cleaned up references; removed Smith; added RE reference; added MANTO reference provided by MANTO team; added Topostext reference; added Wikidata reference provided by bkiesling; summary; added associated modern Location (which supersedes old BAtlas grid square location), as well as associated modern Name
replacing the abbreviation fl. with (river) to bring titles into conformance with Editorial Guidelines
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade
